headline: Will Live Nation Entertainment (LYV) be Able to Mitigate Regulator Concerns Without Divestiture of Ticketmaster?
summary: Third Point Management, a New York-based investment advisor, released its fourth-quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The Third Point Offshore Fund returned nearly 9.1% in the fourth quarter bringing the yearly returns to 24.2%. The performance was driven by positive results across all strategies – equities, corporate and […]
